about_the_game:
Metal Maniacs rejoice! Tork Maddox's legendary car joins the fray, a muscle car super modified to resist everything and everyone. And that's what makes it so irresistible!

Not surprisingly Hollowback™ is one of the few cars in the acclaimed series (and the only one of the Metal Maniacs) that has never been damaged or destroyed. And how could it be? I mean, did you have a good look at it? This racing car is made of pure solidity and, with its V8 engine, it will make its way through all the opponents on its path, leaving a void behind (staying true to its name).
A must-have for all AcceleRacers fans that should be present in every collection!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2
detailed_description:
Metal Maniacs rejoice! Tork Maddox's legendary car joins the fray, a muscle car super modified to resist everything and everyone. And that's what makes it so irresistible!

Not surprisingly Hollowback™ is one of the few cars in the acclaimed series (and the only one of the Metal Maniacs) that has never been damaged or destroyed. And how could it be? I mean, did you have a good look at it? This racing car is made of pure solidity and, with its V8 engine, it will make its way through all the opponents on its path, leaving a void behind (staying true to its name).
A must-have for all AcceleRacers fans that should be present in every collection!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Hollowback™

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Metal Maniacs rejoice! Here is the legendary car of Tork Maddox, a muscle car super modified to resist everything! Hollowback™ is made of pure solidity and will leave a void behind! A must-have for all fans!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
